title: paramAnandam perugi
sahitya:
paramAnandam perugip-pallANDu pArAlayattilE sIr Ongi vAzhga


anupallavi

  paripUrNa yOga bhOga vaibhavattAl bhakta kOTi ellAm shuddha siddhi peTrE


caraNam    dharmArttha kAmam tAngum illaramum tava shakti tarum sahaja muktiyum
karma vAzhvanaittum brahma yagjnamAgak-kANUm deiva nilai pUNum Anum peNNum
